ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates how to use the PaletteProvider API to color SurfaceMesh cells individually.
ExampleDefinition.Description:
Demonstrates how to use the PaletteProvider API to color SurfaceMesh cells individually. This can be used to change the color of a cell but also to show holes in a surface mesh (or nulls) by returning the color transparent.
[b][i]Tip![/i][/b]
The PaletteProvider is useful for showing thresholds or areas of interest!
